701301f-a.title: Bronx: Independence Avenue - 254th Street (West)
701301f-a.text:
Independence Ave. (extreme right, where men are working), at the
N.W. corner of West 254th Street (foreground). The road seen in the
center of the view extending to the background is a private driveway
to Riverdale Manor, exclusive real estate development of which Cross
\& Brown Company are the agents. A sign in front of the left entrance
post says: Hillside, no thoroughfare.
April 24, 1937.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.

701302f-a.title: Bronx: Independence Avenue - 254th Street (West)
701302f-a.text:
Jndependence Ave., between West 254th and West 256th Streets. The
view is westward across Riverdale Hill sloping down to the Hudson River.
In the background is the New Jersey shore.
April 24, 1937.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.

701304f-a.title: Bronx: Independence Avenue - 254th Street (West)
701304f-a.text:
Independence Ave. (foreground, not seen), east side, between West
254th and West 256th Street. The road here shown was the private driveway,
running northeastward, on the Burghard Steiner estate. lIt conmmenced at
Independence Ave., about 325 feet north of West 254th Street and met West
256th Street at Blackstone Ave. The barn, on the left, will be exactly at
the S.W. corner of West 256th Street and Blackstone Ave. when the thorough-
fares are cut through at this point.
April 24, 1937.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.

701303f-b.title: Bronx: Independence Avenue - 254th Street (West)
701303f-b.text:
Independence Ave., west side (foreground, vantage point), between
West 254th and 256th Streets, showing the driveway and private residence
of Dr. william Sargent Ladd, known as, AHillside'' (Bromley's map of
1924 as revised to September 1932). The Bromley and Robinson maps
from 1879 to 1913 show it to be on the estate of S.D. Babcock. The
view is northwestward.
April 24, 1937,
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
(2)
The same, another view. The Hudson River is discernible through
the trees, on the left.
April 24, 1937.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.

701303f-a.title: Bronx: Independence Avenue - 254th Street (West)
701303f-a.text:
Independence Ave., west side (foreground, vantage point), between

1924 as revised to September 1932). The Bromley and Robinson maps

April 24, 1937,

(2)

April 24, 1937.
P. L. Sperr.
